title: Scorpius

nouns: Scorpius, sometimes known as Scorpio, is one of the constellations of the zodiac.
Eighth astrological sign in the zodiac
Scorpio is the eighth astrological sign in the Zodiac.
One of the twelve constellations of the zodiac.
A large zodiacal constellation between Libra and Sagittarius

description: The Scorpius astrological sign in the Zodiac. This Zodiac Symbol represents a Scorpion.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's scorpio emoji is a striking representation of the zodiac sign, featuring a sleek, dark silhouette with a subtle glossy finish that highlights its sharp, defined form. On Apple devices, the scorpion's tail is poised dramatically, embodying the intensity and passion associated with this astrological sign. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying fierce determination, hidden depths, or a strong, protective nature in your messages.
